Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [driving past a line of Mexican men looking for work] Hola, hola. Necesito une bueno worker. Tu esporte! Come on! [man walks away] Que? QUE?

Quote.Speaker: Mexican Man
Quote.Text: [speaking Spanish]

Quote.Speaker: Son
Quote.Text: We don't go with that man. I've seen several men go with that man and not come back.

Quote.Speaker: Mexican Man
Quote.Text: [speaking Spanish]

Quote.Speaker: Son
Quote.Text: We've lost friends.

Quote.Speaker: Mexican Man
Quote.Text: [speaking Spanish]

Quote.Speaker: Son
Quote.Text: We don't know what he does with them.

Quote.Speaker: Mexican Man
Quote.Text: [speaking Spanish]

Quote.Speaker: Son
Quote.Text: I don't want to talk about it anymore.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I pick up day laborers and tell them they'll get paid at six p.m. At five forty five, a certain INS agent by the name of Mose Schrute throws them in the back of a van, drops them off in the middle of Harrisburg and tells them it's Canada.

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: Hola amigo.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hola, tu es une buena worker?

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: Si, yo muy bueno worker.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Y el accento, donde are you from?

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: Scranton, y before that La Philadelphia.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You speak English?

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: Yes, I'm really good at English.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ok, good. Me too, get in the car.

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: [quietly] Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [nods to camera]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [seeing the worker Dwight picked up in the parking lot] Who's this guy by our cars?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That is my new maintenance worker, Nate. And you'll be happy to know that he's taking care of that hornet's nest that you've been griping about.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Yeah, I got stung up my dress.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Poor hornet.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [looking outside through the window] I left him all the tools he needs. This is do or die. If he chooses correctly he'll conquer the hornets...

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: But if he doesn't?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: He'll die.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Uhh, beg your pardon?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: When did the phrase do or die become so corrupted?

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: [picks up blowtorch]

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Is that a blow torch?!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No. No no no! [nos coming from all employees]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Interesting choice...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [Nate starts walking away from hornet's nest, puts down the blowtorch] Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Very very smart.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, go away. [Kelly nodding]

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: [picks up baseball bat, heads towards hornet's nest]

Quote.Speaker: Employees except Dwight
Quote.Text: No! No no!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: A bat! Impressive...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh it's stinging him! Ow! Ow! [yelling all around the office]

Quote.Speaker: Michel
Quote.Text: [walks into the office with a large, fake mustache on] Good morning Erin, any mustaches? I mean messages?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [giggles] Terrific!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: There are many reasons a man would wear a fake mustache to work. [spinning in chair] He is a fan of the outrageous. He loves to surprise! He loves... other things as well.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: [seeing a large red spot on Michael's lip] God! Wow!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [shying away] Look, [sighs] It's a pimple Phyllis. Avrile Lavigne gets them all the time and she rocks harder than anyone alive.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: That's no pimple Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You mean cancer?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What? No! Wait, no. Definitely not cancer.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's just good to stop a Michael train of thought early before it derails and destroys the entire town.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. It's just a cold sore.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It is?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Yup, just a cold sore.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Just a cold sore, thank you. Phyllis, I don't have acne. I have a cold sore. I don't even have a cold. I don't know how I got it.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I know how you got it. [smug expression on his face]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Michael come on. A cold sore is herpes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Wait! What you should do, Michael, is have a doctor take a look at it. Because we really don't know what that is.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: I know tons and tons of people who have herpes. I have it myself. That's what it is.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I never seen herpes on you.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Because it's on my genitals, genius.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: You have a penis?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Michael, have you ever been tested for STDs?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah! My last physical when I was forty.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That was like, ten years ago.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No! It was like four years ago!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Michael, you're at least forty six!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why at least? If you're guessing forty six just say forty six. [later in his office, places a band-aid over his cold sore]

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Can we please talk about how gross Meredith is?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: This is what you get when you treat your body like an outhouse.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You know what guys, why don't we just chill out on this herp-chat. Ok? I was an REA in college and I can tell you, number one sexually transmitted disease is ignorance.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: I guess maybe you should go marry a meth dealer with crabs.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I don't even wanna know these things!

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: [walking in] Hey guys! [Angela leaves the table, exhales as she exits the room]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How did this happen, how did I get this?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Some eggs can rely dormant in a woman for years, they may not even know they have it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what, I feel like one of those old timey sailors. With the eye patch. [in pirate voice] It's me own damn fault. Woman in every port.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What port? The Jan port. The Holly Por...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Don't even! Holly was clean! Okay? If anything I gave it to her.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You may have...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh my God! What if I did?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You need to contact Holly! You need to notify her, that she is crawling with herpes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay! You know what? Might! Might be crawling with herpes. I might have gotten it after her.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You need to contact every woman you've been with, and notify them of your herpes infestation. It's the right thing to do.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: There's no way I'm gonna do that.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Then I will.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [makes grunt in attempt to stop Dwight. Dwight hangs up]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, I'm no doctor, but it seems to me that we all have an obligation to the public health to track down anyone who gives us a disease, inform them of it, and take overwhelming revenge on that person. Again, I'm no doctor. I'm just a normal guy who enjoys revenge.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: [on phone] Hello?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hi Donna. It's Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Michael, I didn't think I'd here from you. How have you been?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have a disease, for which there is no known cure, that has been sexually transmitted to me.

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Oh no.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I can't even say it. H-I...

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Oh my God.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: ...R-P-E-E-S

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Wait, you're calling to tell me that you have herpes?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, I am calling to see if you gave me herpes. Because if you did I would be able to avoid a lot of sucky conversations. So you have it right?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: Ummm, no.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Does your stupid husband have it?

Quote.Speaker: Donna
Quote.Text: No! He doesn't. Are you telling me I have to get tested?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes I am telling you you have to get tested for herpes. Good-bye!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So long Donna! [Michael hangs up]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Excuse me everyone, can I have your attention please?

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Not again...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What do you mean again?

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: You're always asking for our attention.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Maybe like a year ago...

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Seems recent.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No, that's...

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Andy, the reason it seems more recent is because many of us here have never stood up and asked for everyone's attention, and it seems like you've done it on several occasions.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Everyone, I've noticed that we have not been entirely kind to one of our own, due to stigmas and prejudices.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh! When you got your new phone, that's when you asked for everyone's attention.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: [agreement around the office] That's what I was thinking, you kept announcing scores.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It's the world's only international sport! [sits down]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [on phone] This is Holly.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No this is Holly.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No this is Holly.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No this is Holly.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No, this is Michael Scott.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Busted. So what can I do for you Holly.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I am calling because, there's a terrible crash!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh really? Was anyone killed?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: A lot of people.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Any nuns?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Three nuns, [Michael laughs] from a Missionary in South Africa.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Dwight looks confused to the camera] Were they in the missionary position? [Holly laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [singing] Ba na na na na. Hot pizza, check it and see. Ba na na na. Got a whole bunch of pepperoni. Ba na na na na. [stops singing] Yeah, now you're looking at me. Anyone who's interested in entering into an honest discussion about the sexual mores and taboos of modern society will be rewarded with a pizza break.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [still on phone with Holly] Do you ever wonder what life would have been like if you hadn't been transferred?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We would have twins. [Dwight points towards the corner of his lip, indicating Michael's "herpes"]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I don't think we'd have kids.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mmhmm!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: It was just for a few weeks!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mhhmm! We would be married.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [sternly] Michael, I have been dating A.J. for a year and a half now. You do this you know.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Do what?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You romanticize things.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't romanticize th- [Dwight nodding and mouthing 'Yes you do'] No...

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael, you cried at that tagline for a movie you made up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He had no arms or legs, he couldn't hear see, or speak... This is how he let a nation.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You made ourselves to be more than we were.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We were more than we were.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I don't know what you're getting so upset about, we had to break up a long time ago, it was a good memory.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok, alright I gotta go.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael... [Michael hangs up]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [to the camera] He forgot to mention the herpes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It didn't come up organically.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: [to a client] ...to accommodate the, uh, suppliers. [Seeing Michael and Dwight] Gentlemen! Nice to see you, it'll be just a moment. If you could show them into Conference Room B. [to client again] The pharmaceutical aspects should be able to...

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: How do I do it? Raise my daughter, work as director of office purchasing for this hospital and release an album of Dorris Day covers on my own label? If I knew I'd tell you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's nice to see you doing so well.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Yeah I'm really happy. Me and Astrid against the world. [laughs] We're loving it, yeah. I'm kind of a supermom.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Bringing home the bacon.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Yeah. [singing] Fry it up in a pan. Never never never let you forget... [laughs] I love that commercial.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I don't understand the reference.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Well, Michael, it was nice to get your call.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: We had to come over right away, it's urgent. Michael has something to tell you. [Michael shushes him]

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Are you gonna keep me in suspense? [Michael sighs]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [after long wait, to Dwight] Would you excuse us...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ok I'm gonna head outta here, I know you have a lot to talk about. Ok, is there a, an operating theater that's open to visitors? Never mind I'll find it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He hasn't changed.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: No, so what couldn't wait?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Am I the kind of person to misremember our relationship as more than it ever was?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Michael Scott, you are here for a post mortem.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: You wanna dig into our relationship, go over it, see what killed it. Ok, I'm in.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: So, guys. I've been really bothered by the way certain people are getting treated around here, and I just think as an office we're better than that. Ok, now I'm going to show you a picture of genitalia. [grossed our remarks from around the office as Andy holds p a picture of a nude man]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What, is it because he's black?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Nope, it's because it's genitalia.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Perfectly normal genitalia Tuna. Now I'm going to show you another picture of perfectly normal genitalia. [Kevin is grossed out immediately. The office is grossed out]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Am I blocking anybody? Can everybody see?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It's normal! Big deal! Yeah sure it has some herpes on it, but you know what? It's just as normal as anyone else's.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: No! In the beginning we were not good.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, there was a little bit of a learning curve in the conversation department, but between the sheets we were like Jordan and Pippin!

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Well if there's anything exciting about it it's because we both knew it was wrong!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Because we work together.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: No, ok. Imagine there's a princess, who falls for a guy beneath her station, and the queen doesn't like this at all. And the princess knows that the queen doesn't like it so it just makes her wanna do it all the more just to get at the queen!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Am I the princess?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: No I'm the princess, and the queen.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sighs] Ok, so I'm the guy at the station.

Quote.Speaker: Astrid
Quote.Text: Mommy!

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Assy! Awwhhh how was school?

Quote.Speaker: Astrid
Quote.Text: It was cool.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: [singing] What did you learn?

Quote.Speaker: Astrid
Quote.Text: What did I learn?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: You might have learned shapes, or blocks, or clocks, or colors. Or you might have learned that we're all, sisters and brothers.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have herpes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I used to think that she was the one. Or at least A the one. And if I called that one so wrong...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Herpes, like all STDS, is a consequence of sex. Can anyone else name any other consequences?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: It feels unbelievable!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [writing on board] Ok I guess I can make a pros column. Feels...

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: ...unbelievable.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: The ability to express love physically. It's a magical thing.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Express love, magical.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: It feels amazing!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Umm, ok is that different from feels unbelievable?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Then I will write it down.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: The feeling of pure risk.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I actually had that down in the cons column, but...

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: It's thrilling.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ok, umm. I'll move that. Thrill of risk.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy, aren't there also negatives to sex?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yes! Thank you! Such as?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Unplanned pregnancy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yes, unplanned pregnancy.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Like Jim and Pam, say whaaat?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Just admit that your baby was a mistake.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey! Our baby was not a mistake. She was a surprise.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Good!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I'm sure they don't regret having their child, let's move it to the pros.

Quote.Speaker: Jim and Pam
Quote.Text: Thank you!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ok, unplanned pregnancy, going in the pros column.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Next stop is Helene. You're gonna wanna make a left on Willow, which is a little ways away, uh. I'll remind you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know, I don't know if I trust Jan's judgment. She...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jan knows paper.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, I'm not talking about paper. Relationships, they have the ability to point out if the man is making a bigger deal out of something that is really there.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Wait, what Holly said?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, I don't...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Forget it Michael! Today is about herpes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I know, I know.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Who gave it to you, who has it, and who is going to pay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Got it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: TO answer your question about Jan, no. Jan is insane. Why do you think I got- LEFT, WILLOW NOW!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'M TRYING! GOD!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [walks into park with Dwight] Hi stranger! Long time!

Quote.Speaker: Old Woman
Quote.Text: Who are you?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm Michael. We dated for a while.

Quote.Speaker: Old Woman
Quote.Text: I don't think so...

Quote.Speaker: Helene
Quote.Text: Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh hey! Dwight, would you take my grandmother for a walk while I talk to Helene?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on old lady. Let's go.

Quote.Speaker: Old Woman
Quote.Text: What is happening? [Dwight shushes her]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Who can tell me what the safest form of sex is?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Condoms.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Incorrect, the only true form of safe sex, ok? Abstinence.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Ohh. Ok. I didn't realize we were doing trick questions. What's the safest way to go skiing? Don't ski! [office laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I just thought I'd bring it up in case someone in here was practicing abstinence. That's all. Anybody?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Andy that's way too personal of a question.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well someone could answer if they want to. [looks at Erin hopefully] Ok, in that case I will now show you how to put this condom on... using this pencil. [Stanley laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Why would you choose a pencil Andy?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well I'm not gonna use my penis, Oscar! It's not exactly hard right now anyway.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Come on, give it a rest pencil dick.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm doing this for you Meredith!

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: I didn't want you it!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well did you h- di- GAH! Does no one appreciate what I'm doing right now?! [throws pizza box at painting and leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Helene
Quote.Text: It'll go away in time just don't touch it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did I make more of what we had then what was really there?

Quote.Speaker: Helene
Quote.Text: What did you think we were?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Just a quirky indie movie weird sort of thing, breaking all the rules. But had to end, because the summer was over. For you...

Quote.Speaker: Helene
Quote.Text: I think for you to have come here even expecting that we can have a conversation like this show's ho-how self deluded you are! Michael, your memory has failed you greatly.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Jerk. [walks off]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Michael! [attempting to get out of the car on the side in which Michael parked too close to a bush. Michael ignores him and walks into a building.]

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: So this is the chef's kitchen, which makes it perfect for real entertainers.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Real entertainers, like Billy Joel.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Carroll, how are you?

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: I'm great! How are you?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm great! I saw your-your sign outside. And I decided, I'm going to pull in, and maybe buy a house from her.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: You didn't call my office and ask where I was?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: Because the receptionist told me a man called but he only said he was my ex-lover.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Weird...

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He sounds like a nice guy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I don't know, I mean people were being really mean to Meredith.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: This wasn't really about Meredith was it. You and Erin are broken up.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: How is that relevant to anything?

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: I asked you if it was ok if I asked her out. You said, and I quote, 'My good sir! Nothing would make me happier than to hand you the hand of the hand once in my hand.' I specifically remember it because you said it in such a weird way.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: The only reason I said that is because you asked me so politely! It was very difficult for me to say no.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: I'll let this slide, but I expect you to put this whole Erin thing behind you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh wow another living room!

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: It's a family room.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You put the TV here, you put the family over here.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: Michael why are you here?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Someone told me that I romanticize relationships

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: You know, we all do that.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have herpes.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: What? Did you have that while we were together?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I just found out today. It's, uh, right there.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: Oh! Oh, that's what you're talking about?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mmhmm, I'm sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: Did the doctor check it out?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm between specialists right now.

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: Yes, yes Michael. Actually you do make a bigger deal out of things than you need to. You proposed to me on our fourth date.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well I believe in love at first sight.

Quote.Speaker: Carrol
Quote.Text: Well so do I, but we didn't love each other at first either. I don't know what you were thinking!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I knew what I was thinking at the time, but right now it just seems ridiculous.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [walking downstairs] Excuse me, someone died in the upstairs bathroom didn't they?

Quote.Speaker: Carroll
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [Andy walks in Darryl's office] We should schedule meetings, because the days can slip away with chit-chat. Are you crying?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No I'm just sweating.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I don't know who's got you upset but my advice is stop crying.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm not crying I'm just sweating.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Look you need to pick yourself up. Man up, alright? You will win this in the end. It's all about heart, and character. Be your best self.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I have no idea what his problem is, that's just my standard advice. It's good advice right?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [on answering machine] This is Holly Flax, I can't come to the phone right now but please leave a message after the sound of the tiny truck backing up. [BEEP]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hi Holly it's Michael, I just wanted to call and let you know that I was thinking about what you said. It's just. You know? It's weird. Today I ended up seeing a lot of women that I used to date, and in my mind they were all great. And then when I actually saw them, it was mostly a freak show. And you and me, that must have been a real train wreck. You know what, Holly? You're wrong. You are wrong. I remember every second of us. And talking to them today, I don't feel for them anything like what I feel for you. I didn't joke with any of them, I joked with you. You are the only one who was actually happy to hear from me. And I don't know why you downgraded what we had but I did not make us up. Ok. Oh, wait, and you should talk to a doctor because you might have herpes. Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What is this about?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oscar, we once sucked face in public. As part of an office presentation to destroy the stigma of gay kissing. Do you recall?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You may have given me a sexually transmitted disease.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Herpes duplex.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It was probably just an ingrown mustache hair but we have to be exhaustive.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have already contacted all of my ex-lovers except for you.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: We were never lovers!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm gonna need a list of every man you've ever had sex with. I'm talking train stations, men's rooms...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Flower shops, fireworks celebrations...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Fence with a hole in it..

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Moolit Gandala, carrage drive through Central Park...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: The woods behind the liquor store, the swamp behind the old folk's home.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: An electric car dealership. [Oscar gets up and starts leaving]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: The democratic primaries,

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oscar! Think abou- Think! [door slams]
